effects.display_string: Set: Holy Shock's healing is increased by 10% and its cooldown is reduced by 10%.
Set: Holy Shock increases the initial healing of your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn by 8%, stacking up to 4 times.
Set: Holy Shock's healing is increased by 10% and its cooldown is reduced by 10%.
Set: Holy Shock increases the initial healing of your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn by 8%, stacking up to 4 times.

(2) Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 560,023 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 219,956.
(4) Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 10,531 for 15 sec.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 70,155 Nature damage over 8 sec.
